N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 521.3 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) This Part shall
apply to any applicant, as defined herein eligible for, or seeking to obtain, a

State aid grant, a mortgage loan from the Facilities Development Corporation
and/or a mortgage loan from the Housing Finance Agency for the purpose of
funding the eligible capital costs associated with the acquisition, construction, reconstruction or rehabilitation of a community mental health
facility, pursuant to articles 41 and/or 75 of the Mental Hygiene

Law. (b) This Part supersedes Part
101 of this Title as it relates to community facilities where services for the
mentally ill are provided in accordance with the Office of Mental Health's
standards. Notes
